nodes.description: 一周前伊拉克军队完全收复法鲁杰市
nodes.support_text: which came a week after Iraqi forces recaptured the city of Fallujah from IS

nodes.description: 周日清晨伊斯兰国宣称的自杀式爆炸袭击巴格达Karrada区
nodes.support_text: a suicide bombing claimed by the Islamic State jihadist group in the upmarket Karrada district early on Sunday

nodes.description: 总理阿巴迪宣布废除假炸弹探测器并加强首都安检措施

nodes.description: 安全官员确认爆炸死亡人数升至213人，伤者超过200人
nodes.support_text: security and medical officials told AFP the number of dead had risen to at least 213

nodes.description: 民众在爆炸现场表达愤怒，批评政府安全措施无效
nodes.support_text: As Iraqis mourned, security and medical officials told AFP the number of dead had risen to at least 213

nodes.description: 伊斯兰国宣称爆炸由伊拉克籍成员执行，作为持续反伊行动的一部分
